description: Convolution of Catalan numbers and powers of 2.
comments: Equals triangle A106270 * A000079, the powers of 2. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 02 2009Binomial transform of A097332: (1, 2, 3, 5, 9, 18, 39,...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 01 2011Hankel transform is A087960. - _Wathek Chammam_, Dec 02 2011
links: Fung Lam, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1600
W. Chammam, F. Marcell√°n and R. Sfaxi, Orthogonal polynomials, Catalan numbers, and a general Hankel determinant evaluation, Linear Algebra Appl. (2011), in press
maple: a:=proc(n) options operator, arrow: sum(2^(n-j)*binomial(2*j,j)/(j+1), j=0..n) end proc: seq(a(n), n=0..23); # _Emeric Deutsch_, Oct 16 2008
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
